DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine effect buprenorphine QT interval correct heart rate ( QTc ) healthy subject .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Buprenorphine Delivered Buprenorphine Transdermal System ( BTDS ) QT Intervals Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: Drugs opioid class associate prolong QT interval/QT interval correct heart rate ( QTc ) .
DOC.criteria: Males females 18 55 year age , inclusive . Body weight range 50 100 kilogram ( kg ) body mass index ( BMI ) ≤ 30 kg/m2 . Healthy determine unremarkable medical history , physical examination , vital sign , laboratory evaluation , electrocardiogram ( ECG ) , 24hour screen ECG telemetry . Willing refrain strenuous exercise contact sport study . Female subject must surgically sterile least 2 year postmenopausal , use effective contraceptive method ( intrauterine device , hormonal contraceptive , doublebarrier method ) . Any clinically significant illness 30 day prior randomization . Any history allergy buprenorphine , excipient BTDS , opioids , psychotropic hypnotic drug , and/or moxifloxacin member quinolone class drug . A clinically significant history allergic reaction wound dressing bandage . Any medical surgical condition might interfere drug absorption ( transdermal gastrointestinal ) , distribution , metabolism , excretion . Abnormalities physical examination , vital sign , ECG , clinical laboratory value , unless abnormality judge clinically insignificant Investigator . Any cardiovascular disorder , include hypertension . Oxygen saturation ( SpO2 ) ≤ 94 % measure pulse oximetry . Any personal family history prolong QT interval disorder cardiac rhythm . Abnormal cardiac condition denote follow : QT interval ≥ 450 millisecond ( msec ) . PR interval > 240 msec ≤ 110 msec . Evidence second thirddegree atrioventricular ( AV ) block . Pathological Qwaves ( define Qwave > 40 msec depth > 0.5 mV ) . Evidence ventricular preexcitation , complete leave bundle branch block , right bundle branch block ( RBBB ) , incomplete RBBB . A rest heart rate outside range 50 85 beat per minute ( bpm ) . Other protocolspecific exclusion/inclusion criterion may apply .
